phrases: You have been sniffing stuff all day.
But I still want to dance
Someday, one day my passion's fire will
One day the flames would die out
Hey, I thought I did not need anything
But even now, I am so serious
I still have time to make it
Ah... but I am going to burn it up, baby
Sorry darling, it is not that easy
But surely it is not that bad either
I am going to burn it up, yeah
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
I am going to burn it up, yeah
Sorry, but I am just a farmer.
I are not got no medicine.
Do not know how to help.
Do not worry, you just sleep some more.
He will leave me behind again.
Do not worry, he just went to go fetch some water.
Nobody is going to leave you behind.
I hate Manjushage, the red spider lilies.
They remind me of my papa and mama.
Papa and Mama were strong and kind.
Papa, take me with you next time.
All shivering pale like they saw a ghost.
We would not even lose to Daigo's army now.
Dororo, I will play with you later.
I want to go with Papa.
I can beat up the bad guys, too.
When you get a little bigger, okay?
Do you want me to hang you up on a tree again?
What is with the puffed cheeks?
I cannot use a sword, so I will beat the bad guys like this.
I like the way you think.
But you know Dororo, you cannot live on just strength from now on.
You will pay for what you did, you crooks!
Do not take us for some lowlife scumbags!
Your papa will always be your papa.
We will round up some men and regroup.
We cannot run away now, for the sake of the men we lost.
Ojiya, we will have to move around for a while.
During these days, brigands scourged the lands of every region.
Their brutality brought fear into the hearts of the helpless.
Samurai who would lost their lords formed their own bands.
And the poor joined them in order to make a living.
Each had their own reasons for joining.
Hibukuro's band consisted of farmers, and they only assaulted samurai.
They were quite a rare band of brigands.
Why do you go beat up the samurai?
It is to teach them a lesson.
So that they will treat us right.
Samurai do not even get that?
I would say they have learned their lesson now.
You have built up a pretty tough band.
Why do not you look towards the future now?
If you play your cards right, the lord will give you a good position.
Itachi, have you forgotten what they have done to us?
Because of the wars those lords started up,
our families were killed like they were nothing but bugs.
They burned down our village that we built up together.
Yeah, I have forgotten those things.
Cannot hold on to things that've passed.
You got to join forces with the samurai from here onwards.
I did not say anything wrong.
Say that one more time and you will get a mouthful of this.
The Yanagimoto guys are worn out from fighting Daigo.
This whole place is going to be a battlefield in no time, Boss.
It is the age of the samurai.
You cannot make a living being stubborn like you.
I am taking your men with me.
I will tear you to pieces!
You cannot even stand on those legs now.
Too bad you cannot tear me to pieces.
The flames of Hibukuro have gone out, and he is just a sack of rags now.
Let us find something to eat.
Is this what hell is like?
I do not know, but it might not be as bad as this.
Why are Manjushage the color of blood?
They might have soaked up the blood of those who died in war.
You are scaring the poor child.
It took years for us to build this village up.
We must not have any obstacles in the way of our army.
How are we supposed to live on?
The lords and samurai think they can do anything if it is for a war.
I will never forget that huge pole sword.
Our homes were raided by brigands, and my friends were all killed.
I could never understand why I alone was left to live.
This is how you use a spear!
The war will end some day.
Once it does, you will be able to eat all you want.
You must not lose to it until then, Dororo.
It may be none of my business,
but samurai are giving handouts over at the temple down that way.
I got nice and cozy with the lord,
but now I have got to achieve something out on the battlefield.
There are lots of brigands around here.
This is the quickest way to gather up some men.
Do not got enough for everyone.
You are not got a bowl.
Sorry, but we do not got any more to lend you.
Are not you going to eat?
Do not worry, eat up now.
I did not want to see you like this.
You cannot live on strength alone from here on out.
Got To be smart, or you will die.
Hold on, I will go find some food.
The war will end some day...
You must not lose to it until then...
I will not say I am hungry anymore, so please do not die.
That is why I am never going to give up.
I am not going to lose to some war...
I know not how you two are related.
But it must be difficult traveling with such a young girl.
I pray that Buddha will bless you on your journey.
That nun said I had the 3-day fever.
I do not remember anything that happened.
Thanks for not leaving me behind.
You cannot see, but she washed my clothes, too.
So I had my clothes taken off?
Hey, did that nun say anything about me?
Hey, I know you can hear me.
Hey, I am talking to you.
There was a former midwife who worked here
who had heard that a baby without limbs was sent floating down a river.
a commander pursuing an Asakura spy was injured severely by an unknown man.
The commander said the man's arms were prosthetics.
Our footsteps admonish indifference in such verbose ways
As I peek into your fathomless eyes, I lose my composure
Is there any hope in the place I am heading to?
because this road is so dark
I will be there to shine the light
I am used to playing at saying goodbye,
but I cried when I waved to you
Our fiery woes fade... and fade... until night falls upon us
If I knew tomorrow would be so mundane,
I would not have said that I wanted to live
I know it is futile but cannot help dreaming of a future... a future... you are to blame
